turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello I wanted to place a coffee order today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: DId you want to go with peets or starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to order from Peets menu

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what would you like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Large iced latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we offer different sorts of milk what would you like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you have soy milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, we have soy milk, almond milk, non fat, and 2 percent.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: soy milk please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what you like and extra shot of flavor

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: sure what flavors are available

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you can do hazelnut, chocolate

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: let me get a shot of chocolate

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like sugar added or on the side

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: add the sugar in please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so I have large latte with a shot of chocolate would you like anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that is it thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok it will be ready in a few minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you for using order a drink.
